mapper.select: select * from tbl_free where userid = (select distinct userid from tbl_free_like where userid = #{userid})
select * from tbl_group_board where userid = (select distinct userid from tbl_group_board_like where userid = #{userid})
select * from tbl_recipe where userid = (select distinct userid from tbl_recipe_like where userid = #{userid})
select * from tbl_userroutine where userid = (select distinct userid from tbl_routine_like where userid = #{userid})
select * from tbl_recommend where userid = (select distinct userid from tbl_recommend_like where userid = #{userid})
